cleaned_text: The following lists are recommended reading for my clients. I have put them together as many of the books are books that have rocked my world or come highly recommended. Please click on the following links to bring you into each of the individual recommended reading lists. I highly recommend that you take time to peruse through the following book lists and jump right into what ever grabs your attention... Enjoy! [My top recommended Books and Movies ](http://andreacullenhealthsolutions.com/2013/07/23/my-recommended-book-film-and-audio-list/) This is my personal list of books and movies that have provided enlightenment, fun, growth, and at times tears. All are highly recommended as is the growing list of documentaries and clips on my YouTube channel here [http://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1Sg3TB7LorCKPXass0ZvKg/videos?view=1](http://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1Sg3TB7LorCKPXass0ZvKg/videos?view=1) Recommended [Books for Personal and Spiritual Growth](http://andreacullenhealthsolutions.com/2013/07/23/wishlist-books/) [Recommended books for Eating Disorders](http://andreacullenhealthsolutions.com/2013/09/18/325/) This list contains several books that are a must read for anyone caught in the battle of mind versus body. Which means most of us!! [Book recommendations for Parenting](http://andreacullenhealthsolutions.com/2013/09/18/323/) This list is growing! I also highly recommend several websites such as the following inspirational blogs: [Recommended Books for Dream Interpretation, Psychic Awareness, and Energy Healing](http://andreacullenhealthsolutions.com/2013/09/18/321/) For those of you eager to dip your toes in a little more [Recommended books for Business and Business Growth](http://andreacullenhealthsolutions.com/2013/09/18/319/) Enjoy and please feel free to add to the list Andrea x
